title: Vachirawit Chivaaree
summary: Bright Vachirawit Chivaaree (Thai: ไบร์ท วชิรวิชญ์ ชีวอารี; born 27 December 1997), known professionally as Bright Vachirawit or Bright (Thai: ไบร์ท), is a Thai actor, singer, model, host, entertainer and philanthropist. He is popular for his lead roles in F4 Thailand: Boys Over Flowers, 2gether: The Series, Astrophile and I Sea U. His successful singles are Unmovable, Lost & Found, My Ecstasy and Saturday Night. He is winner of "Nataraja Award" and "Mani Mekhala Award" for singing and acting respectively. He has won "GQ Men: Actor of the Year Awards 2022" for his role in F4: Thailand.
